scripts.build-publish: npm run build-publish-npmjs && npm run build-publish-github && npm run _tag-release
scripts._build-publish: ng build ngx-draggable-dom --configuration=production && cd dist/ngx-draggable-dom/ && npm publish && cd ../.. && rm -rf ./dist
scripts.build-publish-npmjs: sed -i '' 's/"name": "ngx-draggable-dom"/"name": "ngx-draggable-dom"/' projects/ngx-draggable-dom/package.json && npm run _build-publish; git checkout -- ./projects/ngx-draggable-dom/package.json
scripts.build-publish-github: sed -i '' 's/"name": "[^"]*"/"name": "@bmartinson\/ngx-draggable-dom"/' projects/ngx-draggable-dom/package.json && npm run _build-publish; git checkout -- ./projects/ngx-draggable-dom/package.json
scripts._tag-release: VERSION=$(jq -r '.version' projects/ngx-draggable-dom/package.json) && git tag -a "$VERSION" -m "$VERSION" && git push --follow --tags
scripts.lint: ng lint --fix ngx-draggable-dom-sample; ng lint --fix ngx-draggable-dom
